Quay West Kitchen and Catering

Located at the edge of Robert V. Ostler Park overlooking Discovery Passage Quay West is Campbell Rivers newest dining experience. Boasting some of the best views of Campbell River. Come enjoy a fresh take on food from Marc McGraw's kitchen.

© Quay West Kitchen & Catering, Campbell River BC, 250-286-9988
